resize.title: Free Online Image Resizing Tool | EasyImage.work - Supports BMP, ICO, JPG, JPEG, JFIF, PNG, WEBP
resize.description: Resize your images effortlessly with EasyImage's free online tool. Supports multiple formats and ensures secure, fast processing in your browser.
resize.keywords: resize images, easy image resize, photo resize, online resizing tool, web image resize, offline resizing tool, free image editor, image size adjustment, secure image processing, BMP, JPG, PNG, WEBP
resize.name: Resize Tool
resize.tips: Upload an image and automatically generate an image with pixels decreasing by multiples of 2, with a minimum of 64x64.
resize.upload-tip: Drag and drop the image to this area or
resize.upload-types: Supported image formats: BMP, ICO, JPG, JPEG, JFIF, PNG, WEBP
resize.custom_placeholder: width x height, separated by commas
resize.custom_hint: Scales to fit within target canvas and centers it.
